ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d get Jagged Bands here, AC5 each and +3 str ... Depending on funds available: Skull Shaped Barbute for helm (300pp) Crested Spaulders or BS Mantle
ygData.messageBody:
>So....my question is, what armor pieces out there are better then
>bronze, but might not be as good as lambent (something I can feasably
>get with my level 21 self).
>2 +3 str earrings
>2 +4 str +2wis rings
I'd get Jagged Bands here, AC5 each and +3 str

>Silver ruby veil
>Small bronze: bracer, BP, helm, sleeves, cloak, mantle
Depending on funds available: Skull Shaped Barbute for helm (300pp)
Crested Spaulders or BS Mantle
(150pp, 30pp)
Save up for Small Steel BP

>Small steel: greaves, boots
Get Shin Greaves from Lower Guk, generally available for free if you ask as
they are no drop. This will let you seel the steel greaves to buy steel
somewhere else like arms.

>Bracer of Erollisi Mar
>Collar of undead protection
>Elf hide gloves
I'd say get the Shin gauntlets from Lower Guk here as well. Also generally
available for free and near zone line to Upper. The AC will prolly be worth
more than the stats.

>Thick leather apron
>Dragoon Dirk in my ranged slot

Those are my suggestions. It becomes tougher to find things that are as
good AC-wise as bronze without soaring into the high 100's of pp.

Kit
